src_original: ātmany adhy adhyātmaṃ.  adhy ātmānam iti vā adhyātmaṃ.
ahaṃkārasaṃniśrayatvāc cittam ātmety upacaryata ity ahaṃkārasaṃniśraya ātmety ātmavādinaḥ saṃkalpayanti.  cittaṃ cāhaṃkārasaṃniśraya ity ātmety upacaryate.
ātmanā hi sudāntena svargaṃ prāpnoti paṇḍita
kathaṃ punar gamyate cittam ātmaśabdenocyata iti.  tata āha.  cittasya cānyatra damanam uktaṃ bhagavateti.  anyatra gāthāyām uktaṃ.
[Tib.69a] cittasya damanaṃ sādhu cittaṃ dāntaṃ sukhāvaham
ātmani cittīkārye ātmānaṃ vā cittam adhikṛtya ye dharmāḥ pratyāsannabhāvāt āśrayabhāvena vartante.
te ādhyātmikāḥ.  ye tu viṣayabhāvena vartante.
